main event: On 6 November 1954, several Air Force personnel observed an unidentified flying object at Elmendorf AFB, Alaska.
interesting points: The object was described as luminous and white-colored,The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds,The object traveled at a high rate of speed in level flight,Four unidentified flying objects were detected by radar performing maneuvers at high speed,Ground observers reported the objects were red to orange in color and displayed erratic flight patterns.
sighted object: luminous white object, possibly a balloon
witness description: Air Force personnel including the Commanding Officer of the 57th Fighter Interceptor Squadron and the Base Operations Officer
